value.title: Log management database startup Era Software raises $15.25M

value.title: Xilinx launches Kria chips to handle AI for edge applications
value.excerpt: Xilinx has introduced its Kria programmable chips and boards for holding AI applications at the edge of the network.

value.title: Amid ethical concerns, facial recognition has gained some traction in the US
value.excerpt: Identifying shoplifters and fraudsters may make sense for retail, but what about for marketing? And what about face masks?

value.title: Korean AI-based Diagnostic Software Dr. Answer Helps Countries With a Shortage of Medical Professionals
value.excerpt: Press Release Dr. Answer, an innovative artificial intelligence (AI) based diagnostics application, is expected to significantly help countries with insufficient healthcare professionals make more efficient diagnosis.

value.title: How Communicators Can Help Address Ethical AI Risks
value.excerpt: Fortunately, as communications specialists, we can work cross-functionally to evaluate AI-powered products or services, determine if they have ethical risks and champion actions to manage them.

value.title: UK drone startup sees.ai gets go ahead to trial beyond-visual-line-of-sight (BVLOS) flights

value.title: Nvidia GeForce RTX 3050 and 3050 Ti laptop GPU specifications revealed by Lenovo
value.excerpt: Despite not being officially announced by Nvidia yet, the long-rumored GeForce RTX 3050 Ti and RTX 3050 mobile graphics cards have had their respective specifications leaked by Chinese PC manufacturer Lenovo.

value.title: Python is devouring data science
value.excerpt: Someone once said that Python’s data science training wheels would increasingly lead to the R language. Boy, was he wrong.

value.title: Sanral mulls use of machine learning to improve road safety
value.excerpt: The agency’s Technical Innovation Hub investigates how machine learning can be used to identify trends and incidents to inform appropriate responses and interventions.

value.title: The Forbes 30 Under 30 Asia Startups Unshackling Businesses Using AI
value.excerpt: The four cofounders of South Korean startup Selectstar are among the entrepreneurs in the Enterprise Technology category of this year's Forbes 30 Under 30 Asia list that are using AI technologies to improve everything from drafting legal documents to the way AI itself is trained.

value.title: AI-Powered Shopping App, The Yes, Expands Plus-Size Offering

value.title: The AI arms race has us on the road to Armageddon
value.excerpt: For now, the AI arms race is a cold war, mostly between the U.S., China, and Russia, but worries are it will become more than that. Driven by fear of other countries gaining the upper hand, the world’s military powers have been competing by leveraging AI for years — dating back at least to 1983 — to achieve an advantage in the balance of power .

value.title: Google and Siemens teaming up bringing AI to the factory floor
value.excerpt: The companies are joining forces to create industrial applications, optimize processes, improve productivity and help manufacturers innovate using AI.

value.title: IBM Reports First Quarterly Revenue Growth Since 2018 on Cloud
value.excerpt: International Business Machines Corp. posted its first revenue gain in eleven quarters, driven by demand for cloud services, suggesting Arvind Krishna’s turnaround plan is starting to bear fruit.

value.title: Survey finds talent gap is slowing enterprise AI adoption
value.excerpt: According to an O'Reilly survey, enterprises are struggling to overcome a talent gap in data science, affecting their ability to adopt AI.

value.title: 12 Expert Tips To Help Small Businesses Affordably Leverage AI/ML
value.excerpt: However, with careful planning and targeted implementation, even small businesses can tap into the power of AI and ML. To help, 12 experts from Forbes Technology Council share tips to help small businesses incorporate AI and ML without breaking the bank.

value.title: EU Proposes Restrictive New AI Regulations
value.excerpt: It appears AI in the medical field is here to stay, and thanks to a leaked document, we have our first look at what regulations might look like in the EU.

value.title: Everything Elon Musk Has Said About Tesla's Self-Driving Cars
value.excerpt: Elon Musk has had a lot to say about Tesla's Autopilot feature, which may have been connected to two deaths in an accident on Saturday in Texas.

value.title: US banks are using AI to watch customers and employees
